items.sentence: Tom doesn't know the difference between glass and crystal.
We've been thinking about going to Boston for a long time.
Tom and I've spent a lot of time together studying French.
Tom said that it would be a waste of time to study French.
If you don't have the money, don't try to bargain with me.
The book is on the table and the pen is on the windowsill.
Tom said he knew they might not let him do that at school.
I don't think that it's going to be difficult to find Tom.
Prices in the last ten years have risen by fifty per cent.
From here to the train station takes half an hour on foot.
